title: Hey, Google, is Santa real? AI is ruining Christmas for kids
description: Annoyed parents express their anger with Google and artificial intelligence to The Post after AI discloses the truth about Santa Claus to their young kids.
content:
AI is the new Grinch that’s stealing Christmas.
Nervous laughter was Kelly Bowron’s visceral, hysterical response to her son learning the truth about Santa Claus on Tuesday — courtesy of a Google search.

title: OpenAI Nonprofit Gave $7.5 Million in 2024 Before Restructuring
description: OpenAI, the artificial intelligence startup whose recent restructuring created one of the world’s biggest philanthropic foundations, gave away $7.5 million through its nonprofit in 2024, most of which went to AI safety research.
content:

title: Trading Day: Nvidia sparkle vanishes, Wall Street slammed
description: Wall Street experienced a wild rollercoaster ride on Thursday, opening sharply higher on another set of strong results from artificial intelligence giant Nvidia, only to end deep in the red as investors reassessed that optimism and mixed signals from the first U.S. jobs data since the government shutdown ended.

title: A Hedge Against AI Crash Emerges as Oracle CDS Market Explodes
description: Oracle Corp., the once stodgy database giant that’s borrowed tens of billions and tethered its fortunes to the artificial intelligence boom, is quickly emerging as the credit market’s barometer for AI risk.
